content.description:
Nazi Poster, 1933

bpk Bildagentur / Art Resource, NY

Translation of text: “Then, as now, we remain comrades. German Labor Front.” The German Labor Front was a Nazi-controlled labor organization that replaced the various independent German labor unions in 1933.
content.question: The choice to portray a manual laborer and an engineer in the poster is best explained by the Nazi Party’s efforts to

choices.label: reinforce the subordination of workers to highly educated professionals
counter the communist and socialist message of class struggle
emphasize the value of advanced technology in warfare
convey the possibilities of upward mobility in German society under Nazi rule

content.answer: counter the communist and socialist message of class struggle
